Sentencas: The world power sector is going to change over from its conventional large scale power systems to novel small scale efficient ones, where the fuel cell technology is a promising option.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: In this paper, a novel tri-generation system based on MCFC is presented for power, hydrogen and freshwater production.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: The Solid Oxide Electrolyzer Cell (SOEC) is employed for hydrogen production and Multiple Effect Distillation (MED) system is used for freshwater generation to recover the MCFC waste heat.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: Comprehensive exergoeconomic evaluation and tri-objective optimization is conducted considering exergy efficiency, product cost and CO2 emission as the objectives.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: Besides the operating conditions and optimal design variables are determined for single-objective optimizations.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: The results show that, tri-generation system yields at least 4:5% gain in exergetic efficiency compared to the standalone MCFC.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: From the parametric study it is revealed that, higher values of hydrogen production is reached for lower fuel utilization factor and stack temperature and higher current densities.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: Meanwhile, higher values of freshwater is attained with higher steam to carbon ratio, fuel utilization factor, stack temperature, and lower current density values.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation

Sentencas: The tri-objective optimization results demonstrated that the minimum cost and emissions can be reached to 9.37 $/GJ, and 1.425 ton/MWh, respectively while the maximum efficiency is 46.54% at the best point.
Titulo: Development and tri-objective exergoeconomic-environmental optimization of a novel molten carbonate fuel cell-based system for power, hydrogen and freshwater tri-generation
